articles.content: Its not often that your team wins a game in double-overtime behind a 48-save performance from its rookie goalie. But the New York Islanders, thanks to Ilya Sorokin, did just that, thieving Game 5 fro… [+3467 chars]

articles.author: Adriana Garcia
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo social media post raises questions over Juventus future - ESPN
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo has raised questions about his immediate future at Juventus with an Instagram post in which he thanked fans.
articles.content: Cristiano Ronaldo has raised questions about his immediate future at Juventus with an Instagram post in which he thanked fans for taking part in his journey. The forward, who has one year remaining o… [+3039 chars]
